And<S>2532</S> it came to pass<S>1096</S>, that on<S>1722</S> one<S>3391</S> of those<S>1565</S> days<S>2250</S>, as he<S>846</S> taught<S>1321</S> the people<S>2992</S> in<S>1722</S> the temple<S>2411</S>, and<S>2532</S> preached the gospel<S>2097</S>, the chief priests<S>749</S> and<S>2532</S> the scribes<S>1122</S> came upon<S>2186</S> him with<S>4862</S> the elders<S>4245</S>,
And<S>2532</S> spake<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Tell<S>2036</S> us<S>2254</S>, by<S>1722</S> what<S>4169</S> authority<S>1849</S> doest thou<S>4160</S> these things<S>5023</S>? or<S>2228</S> who<S>5101</S> is he<S>2076</S> that gave<S>1325</S> thee<S>4671</S> this<S>5026</S> authority<S>1849</S>?
And<S>1161</S> he answered<S>611</S> and said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S>, I<S>2504</S> will<S>2065</S> also<S>2504</S> ask<S>2065</S> you<S>5209</S> one<S>1520</S> thing<S>3056</S>; and<S>2532</S> answer<S>2036</S> me<S>3427</S>:
The baptism<S>908</S> of John<S>2491</S>, was it<S>2258</S> from<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, or<S>2228</S> of<S>1537</S> men<S>444</S>?
And<S>1161</S> they reasoned<S>4817</S> with<S>4314</S> themselves<S>1438</S>, saying<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> If<S>1437</S> we shall say<S>2036</S>, From<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S>; he will say<S>2046</S>, Why<S>1302</S> then<S>3767</S> believed ye<S>4100</S> him<S>846</S> not<S>3756</S>?
But and<S>1161</S> if<S>1437</S> we say<S>2036</S>, Of<S>1537</S> men<S>444</S>; all<S>3956</S> the people<S>2992</S> will stone<S>2642</S> us<S>2248</S>: for<S>1063</S> they be<S>2076</S> persuaded<S>3982</S> that John<S>2491</S> was<S>1511</S> a prophet<S>4396</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they answered<S>611</S>, that they could<S>1492</S> not<S>3361</S> tell<S>1492</S> whence<S>4159</S> it was.
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Neither<S>3761</S> tell<S>3004</S> I<S>1473</S> you<S>5213</S> by<S>1722</S> what<S>4169</S> authority<S>1849</S> I do<S>4160</S> these things<S>5023</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> began he<S>756</S> to speak<S>3004</S> to<S>4314</S> the people<S>2992</S> this<S>5026</S> parable<S>3850</S>; A certain<S>5100</S> man<S>444</S> planted<S>5452</S> a vineyard<S>290</S>, and<S>2532</S> let<S>1554</S> it<S>846</S> forth<S>1554</S> to husbandmen<S>1092</S>, and<S>2532</S> went into a far country<S>589</S> for a long<S>2425</S> time<S>5550</S>.
And<S>2532</S> at<S>1722</S> the season<S>2540</S> he sent<S>649</S> a servant<S>1401</S> to<S>4314</S> the husbandmen<S>1092</S>, that<S>2443</S> they should give<S>1325</S> him<S>846</S> of<S>575</S> the fruit<S>2590</S> of the vineyard<S>290</S>: but<S>1161</S> the husbandmen<S>1092</S> beat<S>1194</S> him<S>846</S>, and sent him away<S>1821</S> empty<S>2756</S>.
And<S>2532</S> again<S>4369</S> he sent<S>3992</S> another<S>2087</S> servant<S>1401</S>: and<S>1161</S> they beat<S>1194</S> him also<S>2548</S>, and<S>2532</S> entreated him shamefully<S>818</S>, and sent him away<S>1821</S> empty<S>2756</S>.
And<S>2532</S> again<S>4369</S> he sent<S>3992</S> a third<S>5154</S>: and<S>1161</S> they wounded<S>5135</S> him<S>5126</S> also<S>2532</S>, and cast him out<S>1544</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> said<S>2036</S> the lord<S>2962</S> of the vineyard<S>290</S>, What<S>5101</S> shall I do<S>4160</S>? I will send<S>3992</S> my<S>3450</S> beloved<S>27</S> son<S>5207</S>: it may be<S>2481</S> they will reverence<S>1788</S> him when they see<S>1492</S> him<S>5126</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when the husbandmen<S>1092</S> saw<S>1492</S> him<S>846</S>, they reasoned<S>1260</S> among<S>4314</S> themselves<S>1438</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, This<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the heir<S>2818</S>: come<S>1205</S>, let us kill<S>615</S> him<S>846</S>, that<S>2443</S> the inheritance<S>2817</S> may be<S>1096</S> ours<S>2257</S>.
So<S>2532</S> they cast<S>1544</S> him<S>846</S> out of<S>1854</S> the vineyard<S>290</S>, and killed<S>615</S> him. What<S>5101</S> therefore<S>3767</S> shall<S>4160</S> the lord<S>2962</S> of the vineyard<S>290</S> do<S>4160</S> unto them<S>846</S>?
He shall come<S>2064</S> and<S>2532</S> destroy<S>622</S> these<S>5128</S> husbandmen<S>1092</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall give<S>1325</S> the vineyard<S>290</S> to others<S>243</S>. And<S>1161</S> when they heard<S>191</S> it, they said<S>2036</S>, God forbid<S>3361</S> <S>1096</S>.
And<S>1161</S> he beheld<S>1689</S> them<S>846</S>, and said<S>2036</S>, What<S>5101</S> is<S>2076</S> this<S>5124</S> then<S>3767</S> that is written<S>1125</S>, The stone<S>3037</S> which<S>3739</S> the builders<S>3618</S> rejected<S>593</S>, the same<S>3778</S> is become<S>1096</S> the head<S>2776</S> of<S>1519</S> the corner<S>1137</S>?
Whosoever<S>3956</S> shall fall<S>4098</S> upon<S>1909</S> that<S>1565</S> stone<S>3037</S> shall be broken<S>4917</S>; but<S>1161</S> on<S>1909</S> whomsoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> it shall fall<S>4098</S>, it will grind<S>3039</S> him<S>846</S> to powder<S>3039</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the chief priests<S>749</S> and<S>2532</S> the scribes<S>1122</S> the same<S>1722</S> <S>846</S> hour<S>5610</S> sought<S>2212</S> to lay<S>1911</S> hands<S>5495</S> on<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S>; and<S>2532</S> they feared<S>5399</S> the people<S>2992</S>: for<S>1063</S> they perceived<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> he had spoken<S>2036</S> this<S>5026</S> parable<S>3850</S> against<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they watched<S>3906</S> him, and sent forth<S>649</S> spies<S>1455</S>, which should feign<S>5271</S> <S>1511</S> themselves<S>1438</S> just men<S>1342</S>, that<S>2443</S> they might take hold<S>1949</S> of his<S>846</S> words<S>3056</S>, that so<S>1519</S> they might deliver<S>3860</S> him<S>846</S> unto the power<S>746</S> and<S>2532</S> authority<S>1849</S> of the governor<S>2232</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they asked<S>1905</S> him<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Master<S>1320</S>, we know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> thou sayest<S>3004</S> and<S>2532</S> teachest<S>1321</S> rightly<S>3723</S>,<S>2532</S> neither<S>3756</S> acceptest thou<S>2983</S> the person<S>4383</S> of any, but<S>235</S> teachest<S>1321</S> the way<S>3598</S> of God<S>2316</S> truly<S>225</S> <S>1909</S>: <sup>truly: or, of a truth</sup>
Is it lawful<S>1832</S> for us<S>2254</S> to give<S>1325</S> tribute<S>5411</S> unto Caesar<S>2541</S>, or<S>2228</S> no<S>3756</S>?
But<S>1161</S> he perceived<S>2657</S> their<S>846</S> craftiness<S>3834</S>, and said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S>, Why<S>5101</S> tempt ye<S>3985</S> me<S>3165</S>?
Shew<S>1925</S> me<S>3427</S> a penny<S>1220</S>. Whose<S>5101</S> image<S>1504</S> and<S>2532</S> superscription<S>1923</S> hath it<S>2192</S>? They answered<S>611</S> and<S>1161</S> said<S>2036</S>, Caesar's<S>2541</S>.
And<S>1161</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Render<S>591</S> therefore<S>5106</S> unto Caesar<S>2541</S> the things which be<S>3588</S> Caesar's<S>2541</S>, and<S>2532</S> unto God<S>2316</S> the things which be<S>3588</S> God's<S>2316</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they could<S>2480</S> not<S>3756</S> take hold<S>1949</S> of his<S>846</S> words<S>4487</S> before<S>1726</S> the people<S>2992</S>: and<S>2532</S> they marvelled<S>2296</S> at<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> answer<S>612</S>, and held their peace<S>4601</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> came<S>4334</S> to him certain<S>5100</S> of the Sadducees<S>4523</S>, which<S>3588</S> deny<S>483</S> that there is<S>1511</S> any<S>3361</S> resurrection<S>386</S>; and they asked<S>1905</S> him<S>846</S>,
Saying<S>3004</S>, Master<S>1320</S>, Moses<S>3475</S> wrote<S>1125</S> unto us<S>2254</S>, If<S>1437</S> any man's<S>5100</S> brother<S>80</S> die<S>599</S>, having<S>2192</S> a wife<S>1135</S>, and<S>2532</S> he<S>3778</S> die<S>599</S> without children<S>815</S>, that<S>2443</S> his<S>846</S> brother<S>80</S> should take<S>2983</S> his wife<S>1135</S>, and<S>2532</S> raise up<S>1817</S> seed<S>4690</S> unto his<S>846</S> brother<S>80</S>.
There were<S>2258</S> therefore<S>3767</S> seven<S>2033</S> brethren<S>80</S>: and<S>2532</S> the first<S>4413</S> took<S>2983</S> a wife<S>1135</S>, and died<S>599</S> without children<S>815</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the second<S>1208</S> took<S>2983</S> her to wife<S>1135</S>, and<S>2532</S> he<S>3778</S> died<S>599</S> childless<S>815</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the third<S>5154</S> took<S>2983</S> her<S>846</S>; and<S>1161</S> in like manner<S>5615</S> the seven<S>2033</S> also<S>2532</S>: and they left<S>2641</S> no<S>3756</S> children<S>5043</S>, and<S>2532</S> died<S>599</S>.
<S>1161</S> Last<S>5305</S> of all<S>3956</S> the woman<S>1135</S> died<S>599</S> also<S>2532</S>.
Therefore<S>3767</S> in<S>1722</S> the resurrection<S>386</S> whose<S>5101</S> wife<S>1135</S> of them<S>846</S> is she<S>1096</S>? for<S>1063</S> seven<S>2033</S> had<S>2192</S> her<S>846</S> to wife<S>1135</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> answering<S>611</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, The children<S>5207</S> of this<S>5127</S> world<S>165</S> marry<S>1060</S>, and<S>2532</S> are given in marriage<S>1548</S>:
But<S>1161</S> they which shall be accounted worthy<S>2661</S> to obtain<S>5177</S> that<S>1565</S> world<S>165</S>, and<S>2532</S> the resurrection<S>386</S> from<S>1537</S> the dead<S>3498</S>, neither<S>3777</S> marry<S>1060</S>, nor<S>3777</S> are given in marriage<S>1548</S>:
Neither<S>3777</S> <S>1063</S> can<S>1410</S> they die<S>599</S> any more<S>2089</S>: for<S>1063</S> they are<S>1526</S> equal unto the angels<S>2465</S>; and<S>2532</S> are<S>1526</S> the children<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S>, being<S>5607</S> the children<S>5207</S> of the resurrection<S>386</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> that<S>3754</S> the dead<S>3498</S> are raised<S>1453</S>, even<S>2532</S> Moses<S>3475</S> shewed<S>3377</S> at<S>1909</S> the bush<S>942</S>, when<S>5613</S> he calleth<S>3004</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> the God<S>2316</S> of Abraham<S>11</S>, and<S>2532</S> the God<S>2316</S> of Isaac<S>2464</S>, and<S>2532</S> the God<S>2316</S> of Jacob<S>2384</S>.
For<S>1161</S> he is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> a God<S>2316</S> of the dead<S>3498</S>, but<S>235</S> of the living<S>2198</S>: for<S>1063</S> all<S>3956</S> live<S>2198</S> unto him<S>846</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> certain<S>5100</S> of the scribes<S>1122</S> answering<S>611</S> said<S>2036</S>, Master<S>1320</S>, thou hast well<S>2573</S> said<S>2036</S>.
And<S>1161</S> after that<S>3765</S> they durst<S>5111</S> not<S>3765</S> ask<S>1905</S> him<S>846</S> any<S>3762</S> question at all.
And<S>1161</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S>, How<S>4459</S> say<S>3004</S> they that Christ<S>5547</S> is<S>1511</S> David's<S>1138</S> son<S>5207</S>?
And<S>2532</S> David<S>1138</S> himself<S>846</S> saith<S>3004</S> in<S>1722</S> the book<S>976</S> of Psalms<S>5568</S>, The LORD<S>2962</S> said<S>2036</S> unto my<S>3450</S> Lord<S>2962</S>, Sit thou<S>2521</S> on<S>1537</S> my<S>3450</S> right hand<S>1188</S>,
Till<S>2193</S> <S>302</S> I make<S>5087</S> thine<S>4675</S> enemies<S>2190</S> thy<S>4675</S> footstool<S>4228</S> <S>5286</S>.
David<S>1138</S> therefore<S>3767</S> calleth<S>2564</S> him<S>846</S> Lord<S>2962</S>, how<S>4459</S> is he<S>2076</S> then<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> son<S>5207</S>?
Then<S>1161</S> in the audience<S>191</S> of all<S>3956</S> the people<S>2992</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>,
Beware<S>4337</S> of<S>575</S> the scribes<S>1122</S>, which<S>3588</S> desire<S>2309</S> to walk<S>4043</S> in<S>1722</S> long robes<S>4749</S>, and<S>2532</S> love<S>5368</S> greetings<S>783</S> in<S>1722</S> the markets<S>58</S>, and<S>2532</S> the highest seats<S>4410</S> in<S>1722</S> the synagogues<S>4864</S>, and<S>2532</S> the chief rooms<S>4411</S> at<S>1722</S> feasts<S>1173</S>;
Which<S>3739</S> devour<S>2719</S> widows'<S>5503</S> houses<S>3614</S>, and<S>2532</S> for a shew<S>4392</S> make<S>4336</S> long<S>3117</S> prayers<S>4336</S>: the same<S>3778</S> shall receive<S>2983</S> greater<S>4055</S> damnation<S>2917</S>.
